types.name: Yougin' Fireworks
types.description: Whipper Snappers, sparklers, and other things that should keep you out of the ER

types.name: Might-hurt Fireworks
types.description: These pack a little punch. Black Cats, bottle rockets, and roman candles.

types.name: Might-lose-appendeges Fireworks
types.description: The big show. These should probably require emergency services to be present.

types.name: Black Powder
types.description: Like the name says, black powder. Use it how you will.

types.name: Industrial Explosives
types.description: These will destroy almost anything. Use in small quantities.

types.name: Bombs
types.description: Mother Of All Bombs, Hydrogen bombs, cluster bombs.. Check yourself before you wreck yourself.
